It can stop problems when we talk.
But we must also remember something very important.
A stereotype is a simple idea about a group of people. It is often not true.
Stereotypes can be bad for good work relationships.

Culture from a country can change how we act and think.

The place we come from changes us.
The people we spend time with change us.
Our age changes us.
If we are a man or a woman changes us.
Our work culture changes us.
Our own life experiences change us.

So, we should know about possible differences.
But we should not use them to judge all people from one country.
Feedback received: Grade 3/10 - FAIL
